segments.text: Thanks to you . I'm totally pumped up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you are happy that you made the decision to join us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I surely am . But still there is one single problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I eat more and more these days . And it puts even more weight on me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not good to start with too much work-out at the beginning . What about trying something else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to do that . What do you recommend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: More and more people are warm up to Yoga these days . Do you want to have a try ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think it's a good option for health and relaxation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely . But it takes great perseverance to master .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is a free class going on right over there . Go and join them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything was okay when it started , but the music made me drowsy . So I think I may have dozed off for a minute over there .
segments.speaker: S1
